Name: Phoenix's feather
Description: When you experience death while attuned to this item, the feather is set ablaze, burning your body to ashes. From the ashes, this flame reforms your body. The feather takes a day to restore itself.
FlavorText: A single, radiant feather that glows with a warm, golden light, pulsating softly like a heartbeat. The feather feels almost alive in your hand, emanating a comforting warmth. Said to contain the essence of rebirth and eternal flame, it is a rare and powerful symbol of hope and renewal.

Name: Galecaller Ring
Description: A ring adorned with a water sapphire that grants the wearer the ability to cast Fog Cloud once per day without using a spell slot.

Name: Cloak of the Manta Ray
Description: While wearing this cloak, you gain the ability to breathe underwater and have a swim speed of 30 feet. Ethereal Swim: As a bonus action, you can activate the cloak to gain the ability to move effortlessly through water and air. For 1 minute, you can move through water and difficult terrain as if they were normal terrain. This ability can be used once per short or long rest.

Name: Mist Veil Cloak
Description: While wearing this cloak, you gain advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks in misty or rainy conditions.

Name: Ring of Fire Resistance
Description: You have resistance to fire damage while wearing this ring. The ring is set with garnet.

Name: Ring of Cold Resistance
Description: You have resistance to cold damage while wearing this tourmaline ring.

Name: Ring of Poison Resistance
Description: You have resistance to poison damage while wearing this amethyst ring.

Name: Cinderstorm Gloves
Description: While wearing these gloves, your unarmed attacks deal 1d4 additional fire damage

Name: Belt of Fiery Fortitude
Description: As a bonus action, you can cause the belt to heat up, burning your body. When you do, your Strength score increases by 4 for one minute. Each time you activate this effect you take fire damage equal to half of your maximum health.
FlavorText: This belt, crafted from rugged leather and adorned with simple fire runes, grants its wearer a modest boost in strength when they endure its fiery power.

Name: Toadstool Cap
Description: While wearing the Toadstool Cap, you regain 1d6 hit points at the start of your turn if you have at least 1 hit point and less than half of your hit points remaining. This feature does not work if you take fire damage in the same round. Additionally it allows the wearer to identify poisonous substances by taste.

Name: Woodland Amulet
Description: While wearing this amulet, you can communicate with woodland creatures

Name: Coral Scepter
Description: Spell Attack Bonus: You gain a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls while holding this wand.

Name: Wand of the Healing Tides
Description: Spell Save DC Bonus: You gain a +1 bonus to your spell save DC while holding this wand. Healing Waters: As an action, you can use the wand to touch a creature and restore a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This feature can be used a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.
